paper_abstract: The model following control of a class of second-order dynamical systems is studied based on a parametrical approach The form of the controller is established, the existence conditions of the model following controller are deduced, then the complete parametric expressions of the controller gains are presented based on a parainetrical solution of a class of second-order Sylvester matrix equations, a simple and effective algorithm is concluded; in the end, a numerical example is given to show the effect of the proposed method.
paper_title: A NEW MODEL FOLLOWING DESIGN FOR SECOND-ORDER DYNAMICAL SYSTEMS BASED ON A PARAMETRIC APPROACH
